titles.title: Congratulating Emporia State University for 150 years of outstanding service to the State of Kansas, the United States, and the world.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 2/15/2013--Introduced. Congratulates Emporia State University, in Emporia, Kansas, for 150 years of outstanding service to Kansas, the United States, and the world.
